paper.title: On the Relationship of CCS and Petri Nets

author.org: Institutionen för Informationsbehandling Chalmers Tekniska Högskola

paper.venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming
paper.abstract: We give a partial order semantics to (pure) CCS via a translation into Petri nets and prove, that the interleaved behaviour of the resulting nets is equivalent to Milneru0027s semantics. We show that a large class of CCS programs can be represented by finite nets and that this is impossible for the whole CCS.
